channel.title: Pls help. How to make a command and delete some computer players
channel.description: I want to make a command but where do i insert it? And my server got one buggy computer player which lags the whole server any tips to figure out how?

item.title: Pls help. How to make a command and delete some computer players
item.dc:creator: @durfx durfx
item.description:
@durfx wrote:

Okay I guess I could use a little better grammar then I have been using. It just gets so habit forming typing the quicker way though.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2009, 06:21:26 am[/size][hr]But yes anyways, the commands you are trying to put in would go into your client.java for your server and under

	private void customCommand(String command) {

Read full topic

In that “client.java”

You must put the command under the “customCommand” method.

item.title: Pls help. How to make a command and delete some computer players
item.dc:creator: @durfx durfx
item.description:
@durfx wrote:

u would put the command with all the other commands in the “client.java”

the other commands would look something like this

if(command.startsWith("maxcash") && playerRights >= 3) { yell( ""+playerName+" is gay omg hahahaha"); }
